column1: The  3rd,  5th,6th,7th  and  8th  accused-appellants  (hereinafter  referred  to  as  the  appellants)  were
indicted along with nine others before the High Court of Colombo in terms of, Offences Against
Public Property Act No 12 of 1988 for committing criminal misappropriation of nearly Rs. 4.0 billion
The 14 accused persons are as follows;
